title: My PBE Account is Disabled?
body: when I tried to login to my PBE account to try the new champion, it said my account is currently disabled and I should contact player support  for my recovery. I never got into fights with anyone and never did anything to get me banned, so why is my account disabled, and can anyone help me?

replies.body: I wasn't able to find any PBE account associated with *this* account, but overall there's a good chance that the PBE account you had may have been disabled after a certain period of inactivity or simply because of how old it was. As the email said, contact our player support in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and choose the option "I need help recovering my account". Make sure you give them the Summoner Name of the main account that your PBE one is tied to.
Is that to stop people who bought PBE accounts? Smart.
